responses: Good to see you again Dearest
Hi Dear, how can I help?
I can suggest activities for you to do!

patterns: Which sports is right for me?
Give me a sport activity to do
responses: Football and Basketball if you are more athletic, but if you are just starting out, maybe Badminton or a quick run in the park would suffice!

patterns: Where should I go on my date?
Where do I bring my date?
responses: Maybe a picnic by the beach, or perhaps a movie night! What about maybe a wholesome activity like building a puzzle together!

patterns: Give me a list of book recommendations
responses: Maybe Demian or Lord of the Flies?
HMMMM, Prawn noodles, Lor Mee, oooooo your favourite Fried Chicken from McDonalds. Haiss, maybe its back to caifan, YTF, or Banmian if you are on a diet. Maybe Mala since its your favourite
Hey darling, I love you. You will forever be my dearest of all time, remember that! I love you in every single universe a billion times over <3
